name: Stop the Eye
description:
You play as a sorcerer who has to stop the ferocious eye-beast before it's too late!

Destroy pillars by attacking them and gain various buffs!

Controls

  • F -> Toggle fullscreen
  • WASD or Arrow keys -> Movement
  • E -> Attack
  • Enter or Space or E -> Ui accept
  • W-S -> Ui next

How to play

  • You can attack by pressing E
  • Check out your Health on top-right corner. You are Blue and monster is Purple. Whoever surpasses the other one wins
  • Every 10 seconds
    • 2 bullets will be added to your ammo. You can see your amount of bullets you have at the bottom
    • 3 pillars will emerge, existing ones will disappear
    • Monster will send projectiles at you. Tip: destroy Red pillar
    • Each pillar has a different effect upon it's destruction based on it's color
      • Yellow pillar: gives you movement speed for 10 seconds
      • Blue pillar: adds 3 bullets to your ammo
      • Red pillar: small aoe explosion, destroys enemy projectiles
      • Purple pillar: sends powerful magic attack towards the enemy, dealing big damage. also destroys half the enemy projectiles
  • You can destroy pillars by hitting it 2-3 times
  • You have a limited amount of bullets so use it carefully! Tip: destroy Blue pillar
  • Your projectiles will move towards the monster so position yourself accordingly

Tools used

  • Godot game engine
  • Krita for 2d art

Known issues / missing features

  • No sound, can't tell the 10 seconds interval
  • You can go and stay inside the monster, finishing the game effortlessly (please don't do it lol)
  • You can get stuck in pillar
  • First 5 seconds laggy/freezing due to shader compilation

Theme??

  • Every 10 seconds the enemy does an attack and sends projectiles, also 3 random colored pillars spawn. Due to lack of any sound effects or any visual clue about the timer the games relevance to the theme is very easy to miss.
